subhed: With one week left before Donald Trump's deadline for a deal, with threats to impose 30% tariffs on European imports, Brussels scrambles to avert a trade war. A partial agreement is emerging, but it remains uncertain given Trump's unpredictability.

Macron and Merz try to revive challenging French-German partnership in Berlin
subhed: The French president and the German chancellor met on Wednesday, July 23, to prepare for a joint cabinet meeting scheduled for August 29. From defense projects to trade negotiations, several disagreements remain.

title: French ski coach suspended after sexual assault complaints
subhed: The French Ski Federation, which had referred the case to its ethics committee after Le Monde's initial revelations, announced on Wednesday that it had launched a disciplinary procedure and would join the case as a plaintiff.

title: Syrian commission of inquiry releases report on mass killings in Alawite regions
subhed: The identities of 1,426 victims of the massacres committed in March have been confirmed, and a 'provisional' list of 298 suspects has been drawn up. Yet NGOs fear that the absence of any charges brought against military leaders will lead to a cycle of vengeance and impunity.

title: Harry's Bar: A taste of America in Paris
subhed: A Parisian temple to the cocktail, Harry's New York Bar has continued, since its founding in 1911, to attract both Americans on the move and French patrons looking to quench their thirst for all things American. Visitors come to savor perfectly executed classics as well as elegant new creations.
